00010   // To not depend on Mokka the definitions are copied from
00011   //   Kernel/include/Control.hh

00014 #define SHIFT_M 0
00015 #define SHIFT_S 3
00016 #define SHIFT_I 6
00017 #define SHIFT_J 15
00018 #define SHIFT_K 24
00019 #define SHIFT_2 30
00020 #define SHIFT_1 31
00021 #define SHIFT_index 0
00022 #define SHIFT_type  6
00023 // 2014/8/1: wrongly had only 1 bit for "type" field, when 2 required
00024 // problem found by D.Jeans, fix provided by R.Poeschl
00025 //#define SHIFT_ID    7
00026 //#define SHIFT_cell  15
00027 //#define SHIFT_bad   30
00028 #define SHIFT_ID    8
00029 #define SHIFT_cell  16
00030 #define SHIFT_bad  31 
00031 
00032 #define MASK_M (unsigned int) 0x00000007
00033 #define MASK_S (unsigned int) 0x00000038
00034 #define MASK_I (unsigned int) 0x00007FC0
00035 #define MASK_J (unsigned int) 0x00FF8000
00036 #define MASK_K (unsigned int) 0x3F000000
00037 #define MASK_2 (unsigned int) 0x40000000
00038 #define MASK_1 (unsigned int) 0x80000000
00039 
00040 #define MASK_index (unsigned int) 0x0000003F
00041 // 2014/8/1: wrongly had only 1 bit for "type" field, when 2 required
00042 // problem found by D.Jeans, fix provided by R.Poeschl
00043 // #define MASK_type  (unsigned int) 0x00000040
00044 // #define MASK_ID    (unsigned int) 0x00007F80
00045 // #define MASK_cell  (unsigned int) 0x3FFF8000
00046 // #define MASK_bad   (unsigned int) 0x40000000
00047 #define MASK_type  (unsigned int) 0x000000C0
00048 #define MASK_ID    (unsigned int) 0x0000FF00
00049 #define MASK_cell  (unsigned int) 0x7FFF0000
00050 #define MASK_bad   (unsigned int) 0x80000000 
00051 
00052 
00053 #define MAX_M 8
00054 #define MAX_S 8
00055 #define MAX_I 512
00056 #define MAX_J 512
00057 #define MAX_K 64
00058 #define MAX_index 64
00059 // 2014/8/1: wrongly had only 1 bit for "type" field, when 2 required
00060 // problem found by D.Jeans, fix provided by R.Poeschl
00061 //#define MAX_type 2
00062 #define MAX_type 4
00063 #define MAX_ID 256
00064 #define MAX_cell 32768
00065 #define MAX_bad 2
00066 
00067 #define SHIFT_WAFER_ROW SHIFT_M
00068 #define MASK_WAFER_ROW  MASK_M
00069 #define MAX_WAFER_ROW   MAX_M
00070 
00071 #define SHIFT_WAFER_COL SHIFT_S
00072 #define MASK_WAFER_COL  MASK_S
00073 #define MAX_WAFER_COL   MAX_S
00074 
00075 #define SHIFT_PAD_COL SHIFT_I
00076 #define MASK_PAD_COL  MASK_I
00077 #define MAX_PAD_COL   MAX_I
00078 
00079 #define SHIFT_PAD_ROW SHIFT_J
00080 #define MASK_PAD_ROW  MASK_J
00081 #define MAX_PAD_ROW   MAX_J
00082 
00083 #define SHIFT_LAYER SHIFT_K
00084 #define MASK_LAYER  MASK_K
00085 #define MAX_LAYER_TB   MAX_K

00102   class CellIndex
00103   {
00104   public:
00105 
00106     CellIndex (UInt_t geometrical_cell_index) : _index(geometrical_cell_index), _second(0) {};
00107     CellIndex (UInt_t geometrical_cell_index, UInt_t second_cell_index) : 
00108       _index(geometrical_cell_index),
00109       _second(second_cell_index) {};
00110 
00111     CellIndex (UInt_t wafer_row    /*M*/, 
00112                UInt_t wafer_column /*S*/, 
00113                UInt_t pad_row      /*J*/, 
00114                UInt_t pad_column   /*I*/, 
00115                UInt_t layer        /*K*/)
00116     { 
00117 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00118       assert(wafer_row<MAX_WAFER_ROW);
00119       assert(wafer_column<MAX_WAFER_COL);
00120       assert(pad_row<MAX_PAD_ROW);
00121       assert(pad_column<MAX_PAD_COL);
00122       assert(layer<MAX_LAYER_TB);
00123 #endif
00124 //      std::cout << "wafer row: " << (wafer_row) << std::endl;
00125 //      std::cout << "wafer column: " << (wafer_column) << std::endl;
00126 //      std::cout << "pad row: " << (pad_row) << std::endl;
00127 //      std::cout << "pad column: " << (pad_column) << std::endl;
00128 //      std::cout << "layer: " << layer << std::endl;
00129 
00130      _index=(
00131              ( (wafer_row) << SHIFT_WAFER_ROW) |
00132              ( (wafer_column-1) << SHIFT_WAFER_COL) |
00133              ( (pad_row) << SHIFT_PAD_ROW) |
00134              ( (pad_column) << SHIFT_PAD_COL) |
00135              ( (layer-1) << SHIFT_LAYER));
00136 //     std::cout << "Index: " << std::hex << _index << std::dec << std::endl;
00137 
00138      _second=0;
00139     };
00140     CellIndex (UInt_t wafer_row    /*M*/, 
00141                UInt_t wafer_column /*S*/, 
00142                UInt_t pad_row      /*I*/, 
00143                UInt_t pad_column   /*J*/, 
00144                UInt_t layer        /*K*/,
00145                UInt_t module_index,
00146                UInt_t module_type,
00147                UInt_t module_ID,
00148                UInt_t cell_id,
00149                UInt_t isBad)
00150     { 
00151 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00152       assert(wafer_row<MAX_WAFER_ROW);
00153       assert(wafer_column<MAX_WAFER_COL);
00154       assert(pad_row<MAX_PAD_ROW);
00155       assert(pad_column<MAX_PAD_COL);
00156       assert(layer<MAX_LAYER_TB);
00157       assert(module_index<MAX_index);
00158       assert(module_type<MAX_type);
00159       assert(module_ID<MAX_ID);
00160       assert(cell_id<MAX_cell);
00161       assert(isBad<MAX_bad);
00162 #endif
00163      _index=(
00164              ( (wafer_row) << SHIFT_WAFER_ROW) |
00165              ( (wafer_column-1) << SHIFT_WAFER_COL) |
00166              ( (pad_row) << SHIFT_PAD_ROW) |
00167              ( (pad_column) << SHIFT_PAD_COL) |
00168              ( (layer-1) << SHIFT_LAYER));
00169 
00170      _second=( (module_index << SHIFT_index) | 
00171                (module_type  << SHIFT_type ) |
00172                (module_ID    << SHIFT_ID   ) |
00173                (cell_id      << SHIFT_cell ) |
00174                (isBad        << SHIFT_bad  ) );
00175 
00176     };
00177 
00178      CellIndex (UInt_t geometrical_cell_index,UInt_t module_index,
00179                 UInt_t module_type,UInt_t module_ID,UInt_t cell_id,
00180                 UInt_t isBad) : _index(geometrical_cell_index){
00181 
00182        _second= ( (module_index << SHIFT_index) | 
00183                   (module_type  << SHIFT_type ) |
00184                   (module_ID    << SHIFT_ID   ) |
00185                   (cell_id      << SHIFT_cell ) |
00186                   (isBad        << SHIFT_bad  ) );
00187 
00188      };
00189    
00192     UInt_t getLayerIndex() const {
00193       return (((_index & MASK_LAYER) >> SHIFT_LAYER) + 1);
00194     };
00195     
00198     CellIndex &setLayerIndex(UInt_t layer /*K*/) 
00199     {
00200 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00201       assert(layer<MAX_LAYER_TB);
00202 #endif
00203       _index = (_index & (~MASK_LAYER)) | ((layer-1) << SHIFT_LAYER);
00204       return *this;
00205     };
00206 
00209     UInt_t getWaferRow() const {
00210       return ((_index & MASK_WAFER_ROW) >> SHIFT_WAFER_ROW);
00211     };
00212 
00215     CellIndex &setWaferRow(UInt_t wafer_row /*M*/) {
00216 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00217       assert(wafer_row<MAX_WAFER_ROW);
00218 #endif    
00219       _index = (_index & (~MASK_WAFER_ROW)) | (wafer_row << SHIFT_WAFER_ROW);
00220      return *this;
00221   };
00222 
00225     UInt_t getWaferColumn() const {
00226       return (((_index & MASK_WAFER_COL) >> SHIFT_WAFER_COL) + 1);
00227     };
00228 
00231     CellIndex &setWaferColumn(UInt_t wafer_column /*S*/) {
00232 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00233       assert(wafer_column<MAX_WAFER_COL);
00234 #endif    
00235       _index = (_index & (~MASK_WAFER_COL)) | ((wafer_column-1) << SHIFT_WAFER_COL);
00236      return *this;
00237     };
00238 
00241     UInt_t getPadRow() const {
00242       return ((_index & MASK_PAD_ROW) >> SHIFT_PAD_ROW);
00243     };
00244 
00247     CellIndex &setPadRow(UInt_t pad_row /*J*/) {
00248 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00249       assert(pad_row<MAX_PAD_ROW);
00250 #endif    
00251      _index = (_index & (~MASK_PAD_ROW)) | (pad_row << SHIFT_PAD_ROW);
00252      return *this;
00253     };
00254 
00257     UInt_t getPadColumn() const {
00258       return ((_index & MASK_PAD_COL) >> SHIFT_PAD_COL);
00259     };
00260 
00263     CellIndex &setPadColumn(UInt_t pad_column /*I*/) 
00264     {
00265 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00266       assert(pad_column<MAX_PAD_COL);

00268      _index = (_index & (~MASK_PAD_COL)) | (pad_column << SHIFT_PAD_COL);
00269      return *this;

00273     UInt_t getModuleIndex() const {
00274       return ((_second & MASK_index) >> SHIFT_index);
00275     };

00277     CellIndex &setModuleIndex(UInt_t module_index){
00278       #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00279       assert(module_index<MAX_index);
00280 #endif    
00281      _second = (_second & (~MASK_index)) | (module_index << SHIFT_index);
00282      return *this;
00283     };
